activities:
In providing a variety of healthcare information technology services to our clients , Sunquest Information Systems, Inc. and its affilates may access client systems containing client and patient personal data.  In doing so, Sunquest and its affiliates  act as a data processor and does not own or control such personal data.  As a data processor, Sunquest is required to provide services to our clients in accordance with our contractual arrangement with our client and any requirements, instructions or provisions regarding data handling or privacy within such contracts.  

Sunquest acts in the capacity of a data controller in the limited circumstances of collection of personal data for Sunquest employment matters and in collection of data from Sunquest website visitors.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, Finance, Treasurer and Assistant Secretary
personaldata: Electronic customer and patient data and electronic and hardcopy employee data
recoursemech: For all but human resources information, Sunquest Information Systems has selected the Direct Marketing Association (DMA) to serve as the independent third party dispute resolution mechanism.  Sunquest agrees to cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) in resolving any disputes over handling of human resource data.
